title: Windows 11 build 25120 is the first step toward a possible future with widgets on the desktop
content:
Today, Microsoft is releasing Windows 11 Insider Preview build 25120 to the Dev channel. There isn’t a whole lot that’s different, but there is one notable change: a search box on top of the desktop. As noted in the blog post, the Dev channel is about testing new features, so this might not ever ship.

The post Windows 11 build 25120 is the first step toward a possible future with widgets on the desktop appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is releasing a new Windows 11 Insider Preview, and build 25120 adds a search box right on top of the desktop in the OS.
